about_the_game:
In Mecha Blitz, players build mechs called 'Arbiters', and fight fast-paced, anime-inspired isometric top down shooter arena battles in both online multiplayer PvP and single player PvE game modes. Customize your robot fighter with a variety of parts, weapons and cosmetics. Upgrade your equipment, abilities and stats as you progress through the game!

Armor up, Arbiter, and join us now!


This list represents the game features in Early Access.
  • Build and Customize your Mech. Choose over 100 parts, internals and weapons to build the Arbiter of your dreams. This number doesn't even include the various other cosmetic options!
  • Craft and Create the Way you Play. Different loadouts and setups require different strategies and styles of fighting. From mobile glass cannons to sturdy armored fortresses, long-range snipers to close-range melee... which of these will you be on the battlefield?
  • Single Player PvE Game modes. 1v1 ladder matches, survival, time attack, boss challenges... with even more game modes planned in future updates!
  • Online Multiplayer PvP. Bring your creation online and fight other players in 1v1 duels, 2v2 team fights and 4 player free-for-alls! The game runs on rollback netcode!
  • MB Shop and Upgrades. Earn currency and upgrades by fighting and winning. Buy cosmetics with in-app purchase options.
  • Planned Features. Come full-release, a non-linear single player campaign with multiple endings. On the multiplayer side, seasonal rewards and new game modes such as 5v5 team fights and 10-mech free-for-alls!


Humanity was exiled from Earth. Seeking to take back their home, they created powerful armored mecha warriors known as 'Arbiters'. You are one of their pilots - the core of a new fighting force, and the last hope of survival.


Join our Discord Community for up-to-date news and updates from the Mecha Blitz team. Discuss and chat with our devs and fellow players about features, feedback and suggestions. Community events, tournaments and promotions will primarily be held in the server as well.
